full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP) Summary

The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) invites qualified suppliers to provide professional services for a research project aimed at analyzing large truck accident data. The project aims to assess the probabilities of a severe accident and evaluate the impact of various factors, such as alcohol and drug-related accidents, disobeying traffic controls, and maintenance issues, on transportation safety.

**Project Objectives:**

* Analyze large truck accident data from a previous probabilistic risk assessment and the Ministry of Transportation of Ontario (MTO)
* Investigate the impact of accidents on the probabilities of a severe accident
* Improve the understanding of the safety of the transport of radioactive material
* Communicate regulatory requirements and relative safety risks to the public

**Pre-requisites:**

* Familiarity with Transport Canada's database and regulations
* Experience in risk assessment and analysis
* Ability to communicate efficiently in both official languages (English and French)

**Contract Details:**

* Contract duration: 1 year
* Commencement of contract: On the date of contract award
* Bidding instructions: Interested suppliers must submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions provided in this RFP

**Updates:**

* Interested suppliers are advised to follow the notice and subscribe to one of the notification methods to receive all updates to this solicitation.
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Bids can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments:**

* A complete description of the work to be completed under this requirement is provided in Annex "A" of the Request for Proposals (RFP).
* All relevant documents can be downloaded from the [Canada Buy and Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/09/6f19f0337465c82a749776a3e8139a8f/final_technical_report_-_lrc_212685_rev_3_0_-_r660_1_ram_transport_risk_assessment_english_only-en_anglais_seulement.pdf).
